fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- With the Rebel Flag, you have infinite drinks.
- You have two abilities that you can choose, with a menu like the Potion Master.
- You can give out a first taste, making someone drunk.
- You can overdose a drunk, killing them.
- On the first night of being drunk, they will be unable to talk.
- Being drunk lasts for two nights.
- After the drunkenness runs out, they will have a hangover which prevents them from having their defense raised above None.
- Doing nothing brews a drink (which is necessary for either ability).
- Being risen by a Retributionist, Necromancer, or Archivist will give out a first taste, regardless of the Distillerâ€™s drink count while alive.
